properties.description:
This is a rule to notify us when a device is not showing any signs of activity in a 24-hour span, weekends are excluded in this query.

Handling Guidance: https://costar-group-prod-dev.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SCSP/pages/390039244/General+Incident+Report+Handling+Guidance
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where Timestamp between (ago(31d) .. ago(1d))
| where dayofweek(Timestamp) != 0 and dayofweek(Timestamp) != 6
| summarize LastActivity=max(Timestamp) by DeviceId, DeviceName
| join kind=leftanti (
    DeviceProcessEvents
    | where Timestamp > ago(1d)
    | summarize by DeviceId
    )
    on DeviceId
| where DeviceName !contains "ip"
| where DeviceName !contains "ec2"
| where DeviceName !contains "cg01"
| where DeviceName !contains "hn50"
| where DeviceName !contains "prd"
| where DeviceName !contains "cs01"
| where DeviceName !contains "-" 
| where DeviceName !contains "com" 
| where DeviceName contains "us.costar.local"
| project AbsentDeviceId=DeviceId, LastSeen=LastActivity, DeviceName
